title: Client Intake Summary
description: Structure new client information into a clear intake summary with recommended next steps.

body.content: Create an intake summary for a new SBDC client.

body.label: Client First Name
body.tip: Client's first name only — protect PII

body.label: Business Stage
body.tip: Where is this business in its lifecycle?

body.label: Primary Need
body.tip: What brought them to the SBDC?

body.label: Background Info
body.placeholder: Any notes from your initial conversation — their story, experience, goals, concerns, timeline, etc. Raw notes are fine...
body.tip: Whatever you know so far about this client

body.content:
Please create a structured client intake summary for my records that includes:

1. Client Profile — organized summary of who they are, their business, and their background
2. Needs Assessment — what they're looking for and why, based on the information provided
3. Business Stage Analysis — where they are and what's typical for businesses at this stage
4. Recommended Service Plan — suggest 3-5 specific SBDC services or resources that match their needs (e.g., business plan development, financial projections review, market research, loan package preparation, workshop recommendations)
5. Priority Action Items — the 3 most important next steps, in order
6. Suggested First Session Agenda — what to cover in the first full advising session
7. Information to Request — what documents or details to ask the client to bring next time

Format for CRM entry — professional, concise, and scannable.
